actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

official_title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to require the Committee on Appropriations to maintain proposed and historical budget authority and outlays for each category of spending.

summary.text:
This resolution requires the House Appropriations Committee to maintain proposed and historical budget authority and outlays for each category of spending.

Such data shall

 cover a period comprising the 10 fiscal years immediately preceding the budget year, and be kept up-to-date and provided on the public website of the committee.
